item.title: Mathematical Typesetting in Hugo
item.description: MathJax MathJax 3 is fully supported in Goldmark and is only fractionally slower than Katex. Create mathjax3.html in /layouts/partials and add the following: <script> MathJax = { tex: { inlineMath: [['$', '$'], ['\\(', '\\)']], displayMath: [['$$','$$'], ['\\[', '\\]']], processEscapes: true, processEnvironments: true, tags: 'ams' }, svg: { fontCache: 'global' }, options: { skipHtmlTags: ['script', 'noscript', 'style', 'textarea', 'pre'] } }; window.addEventListener('load', (event) => { document.querySelectorAll("mjx-container").forEach(function(x){ x.parentElement.classList += 'has-jax'}) }); </script> <script src="https://polyfill.
